Package buildingOrderModule.scoringDirector

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ScoreGeneratorFactory
    ScoreGeneratorFactory.java --- A Interface defining a factory for ScoreGenerators (Abstract Factory Pattern).
    ScoringAction
    ScoringAction.java --- A Interface for all Actions that a ScoringDirector will be able to update.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ScoreGeneratorFactoryTerranBio
    ScoreGeneratorFactoryTerranBio.java --- a ScoreGeneratorFactory for the Terran Race with the focus being on bio Units.
    ScoreGeneratorFactoryTerranDefault
    ScoreGeneratorFactoryTerranDefault.java --- a ScoreGeneratorFactory for the Terran Race.
    ScoreGeneratorFactoryTerranMachines
    ScoreGeneratorFactoryTerranMachines.java --- a ScoreGeneratorFactory for the Terran Race with the focus being on machine Units.
    ScoringDirector
    ScoringDirector.java --- A director that updates the scores of provided ScoringActions based on the current state of the game in comparison with goals that each subclass of the ScoringDirector defines.
    ScoringDirectorTerranBio
    ScoringDirectorTerranBio.java --- A ScoringDirector that changes the scores of the Actions used in the ActionQueueSimulationResults for a Terran-Bio configuration and therefore providing the bio version of the Terran ScoreGeneratorFactory.
    ScoringDirectorTerranMachines
    ScoringDirectorTerranDefault.java --- A ScoringDirector that changes the scores of the Actions used in the ActionQueueSimulationResults for a Terran-Machine configuration and therefore providing the machine version of the Terran ScoreGeneratorFactory.
